title: 207: “Reluctant” Bachelor Fandom + Bachelor Tea w/ Date Card Podcast
itunes:title: 207: “Reluctant” Bachelor Fandom + Bachelor Tea w/ Date Card Podcast
description:
Today The Broads are joined by Jenna and Danika of Date Card Podcast who consistently bring all the tea and hot takes on their podcast and Instagram! First they chat about how Jenna and Danika fell into #bachnation, met, and started their podcast! Then they discuss current Bachelor Nation tea: Arie and Taylor Nolan (Ps. check out Taylor’s amazing podcast “Let’s Talk About It”), Lauren Zima’s copycat podcast (go check out Claire Dee’s podcast “Relationsips”), Chris Randone’s reaction to Krystal’s pregnancy (Congrats, Krystal!!), Blake and Becca K, Luke P’s lawsuit, The Garrett’s, and much more! 


DATE CARD PODCAST:

Listen to their amazing podcast here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/date-card/id1389628122

Follow on Instagram for ALL tea: https://www.instagram.com/datecardpod/

Website: https://date-card.pinecast.co/


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS: 

THRIVE MARKET: Go to Thrivemarket.com/CHATTY and get a FREE gift of your choosing up to $24 dollars in value!

THIRD LOVE: Go to THIRDLOVE.com/CHATTY to get 10% off your first purchase! 

FIGHT CAMP: Go to JoinFightCamp.com/CHATTY and get free shipping and a gift valued up to $109 with your purchase!

MANSCAPED: Go to manscaped.com and use code CHATTY to get 20% Off and Free Shipping!


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
